select phis.PAYMENT_HISTORY_ID, phis.AMOUNT, phis.CURRENCY_CODE, phis.PAYMENT_DESC, phis.PAYMENT_HISTORY_TYPE, phis.PAYMENT_TYPE, phis.TRANSACTION_DATE, phis.TRANSACTION_ID,
, , , , ,
from PAYMENT_HISTORY phis inner join PERSON p on phis.PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID left outer join GIFT g on phis.GIFT_ID = g.GIFT_ID left outer join ADDRESS addr on g.ADDRESS_ID = addr.ADDRESS_ID left outer join PHONE ph on g.PHONE_ID = ph.PHONE_ID left outer join EMAIL e on g.EMAIL_ID = e.EMAIL_ID left outer join PAYMENT_SOURCE ps on g.PAYMENT_SOURCE_ID = ps.PAYMENT_SOURCE_ID where p.SITE_NAME= #siteName#
sqlMap.select: and p.PERSON_ID = #constituentId# order by phis.TRANSACTION_DATE desc
sqlMap.insert:
insert into PAYMENT_HISTORY (AMOUNT, CURRENCY_CODE, PAYMENT_DESC, PAYMENT_HISTORY_TYPE, PAYMENT_TYPE, TRANSACTION_DATE, TRANSACTION_ID, GIFT_ID, PERSON_ID) values (#amount#, #currencyCode#, #description#, #paymentHistoryType:VARCHAR#, #paymentType#, #transactionDate#, #transactionId#, #gift.id#, #person.id#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
